commit.message:
refactor: Remove Chalice (#1152)

* Initial commit to remove Chalice

* Fix scripts path

* Explicitly open db session

* Fix unit tests to use Flask directly

* Use assertIn where appropriate

* Restore cxgpublic header auth hack

* Move client to setUp instead of setUpClass, fix test super setUp calls

* Moving flask specific code out of common.

* lock gunicorn version

* merg

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* fix tests

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* fix auth error messages

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* move gunicorn requirements to api-server

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* Log flask using gunicorn

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* lint

Signed-off-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>

* Fix python module path for version

* Increase gunicorn timeout

* alembic add PYTHONPATH

* undo

* fix: test fix

* fix test

* update tests merged in since pr created

cleanup -- these tests were removed in https://github.com/chanzuckerberg/corpora-data-portal/commit/6d6c05ab919d61f7f9ed14e3e03e1b2cd3a25ed1#diff-33a15fe0c8416d8ff6c006ae7a0f47e99813364827919d3adad4cafeba12680e and inadvertently readded during overlapping refactor

fix merge conflict, ensure deletion has access to session

update revisions tests for refactor

pin pandas

Co-authored-by: Trent Smith <trent.smith@chanzuckerberg.com>
Co-authored-by: Madison Dunitz <dunitzm@gmail.com>
